sn8.1:1: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—​ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā vaṅgīso āḷaviyaṁ vihārati aggāḷave cetiye āyasmatā nigrodhakappena upajjhāyena saddhiṁ. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā vaṅgīso navako hoti acirapabbajito ohiyyako vihārapālo.
sn8.1:2: "Nikkhantaṁ vata maṁ santaṁ,agārasmānagāriyaṁ;Vitakkā upadhāvanti,pagabbhā kaṇhato ime.
sn8.1:4: Sacepi etato bhiyyo,āgamissanti itthiyo;Neva maṁ byādhayissanti,dhamme samhi patiṭṭhitaṁ.
sn8.1:5: Sakkhī hi me sutaṁ etaṁ,buddhassādiccabandhuno;Nibbānagamanaṁ maggaṁ,tattha me nirato mano.
sn8.1:6: Evañce maṁ vihārantaṁ,pāpima upagacchasi;Tathā maccu karissāmi,na me maggampi dakkhasī"ti.
